agenda_items.title: A MOTION WAS MADE BY COUNCILMEMBER REMY, SECONDED BY COUNCILMEMBER DORANS TO WAIVE THE READING OF THE TITLES OF FIRST READING LEGISLATION. THE MOTION CARRIED BY THE FOLLOWING VOTE: AFFIRMATIVE: 6 NEGATIVE: 0
HEALTH & HUMAN SERVICES:  TYSON, CHR. REMY E. BROWN HARDIN
REMY

PRESIDENT HARDIN ASKED FOR A MOTION TO ADJOURN REGULAR MEETING NO. 37 OF COLUMBUS CITY COUNCIL. A MOTION WAS MADE BY COUNCILMEMBER DORANS, SECONDED BY COUNCILMEMBER REMY TO ADJOURN THE MEETING.THE MOTION CARRIED BY THE FOLLOWING VOTE:  AFFIRMATIVE:6 NEGATIVE: 0
To Recognize the 20th Anniversary of the September 11 Terrorist Attacks and Express Appreciation for Members of the US Armed Forces
READING AND DISPOSAL OF THE JOURNAL
To honor, recognize and celebrate Welcoming Week 2021 in Columbus, Ohio and declare Columbus a sanctuary for refugees from Afghanistan
To declare September 2021 as Childhood Cancer Awareness Month in the City of Columbus and to encourage the residents of Columbus and Central Ohio to support families impacted by childhood cancer.

Fiscal Impact: No funding is required for this legislation.
